definition: characteristic of an absolute ruler or absolute rule, a person who behaves in a tyrannical manner
details:
adjective
- characteristic of an absolute ruler or absolute rule
= synonyms: autocratic, dictatorial, despotic, tyrannic, tyrannical
- expecting unquestioning obedience
= example: expecting unquestioning obedience
= synonyms: dictatorial
noun
- a person who behaves in a tyrannical manner
= synonyms: dictator
